message.body: !commands

fragments.text: !commands

message.body: @Athena_sm @Athena_sm Hello, I see you're new here! If you want to learn how to play, type !help or !commands, you can also read the stream description, but be warned because there is a LOT to read, and feel free to ask any questions if you still have questions. The stream can get quite confusing, so feel free to ask, there are people ready to help you out!

fragments.text: @Athena_sm @Athena_sm Hello, I see you're new here! If you want to learn how to play, type !help or !commands, you can also read the stream description, but be warned because there is a LOT to read, and feel free to ask any questions if you still have questions. The stream can get quite confusing, so feel free to ask, there are people ready to help you out!

message.body: @Athena_sm @Athena_sm Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select (Currently disabled), Start (Buttons), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). It's exactly what you'd see if you looked at a Super NES controller! Typos work too! You can also find this help message in the stream description.

fragments.text: @Athena_sm @Athena_sm Valid inputs are A, B, X, Y, L, R, Select (Currently disabled), Start (Buttons), Up, Down, Left, Right (D Pad). It's exactly what you'd see if you looked at a Super NES controller! Typos work too! You can also find this help message in the stream description.

message.body: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

fragments.text: Up to 5 different inputs can be executed at the same time by using + to combine inputs. Example: B+Up+Right will press the B Button, press Up and press Right on the D Pad. It is not needed to start your message with ! mark. Commands are NOT case sensitive: left and lEft will both press Left on the D Pad.

message.body: Normal duration of inputs is 133 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

fragments.text: Normal duration of inputs is 133 milliseconds. You can separate multiple inputs by using spaces or commas to execute multiple inputs in rapid succession.

message.body: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 seconds), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

fragments.text: Example: Up+Right+B;2000 A+X+Down;1000 *5 Will press Up and Right on the D Pad and press the B Button for 2000 milliseconds (2 seconds), then press the A and X Buttons and press Down on the D Pad for 1000 milliseconds (1 seconds), and *5 means the input will be executed once, then it will be repeated 5 times. There is no delay between inputs.

message.body: You can use square brackets to make smaller loops. Example: [A+B;1000 X+Y;500*4] Start [L+R Up+Left*2] 2 will press A+B then X+Y 4 times, then will press Start, then will press L+R then Up+Left 2 times, and everything will be repeated 2 times.

fragments.text: You can use square brackets to make smaller loops. Example: [A+B;1000 X+Y;500*4] Start [L+R Up+Left*2] 2 will press A+B then X+Y 4 times, then will press Start, then will press L+R then Up+Left 2 times, and everything will be repeated 2 times.

message.body: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 133 milliseconds then wait for another 133 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 255+1 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 64 inputs can be chained in a macro.

fragments.text: There is no delay between inputs, but sometimes you'll need a delay between inputs, you can use Wait or Stop to add a delay between inputs. Example: A Wait *255 will press the A Button for 133 milliseconds then wait for another 133 milliseconds, and will repeat that macro 255 times, basically mashing the A Button 255+1 times. Macros can be repeated up to 255 times. Up to 64 inputs can be chained in a macro.

message.body: You can execute commands backwards if you start your message with Invert. Example: Invert A B X Y will execute commands as Y X B A. You can invert directions if you start you message with Opposite. Example: Opposite Up Down Left Right will execute commands as Down Up Right Left.

fragments.text: You can execute commands backwards if you start your message with Invert. Example: Invert A B X Y will execute commands as Y X B A. You can invert directions if you start you message with Opposite. Example: Opposite Up Down Left Right will execute commands as Down Up Right Left.

message.body: You can use both Invert and Opposite at the same time. Example: Opposite Invert A+Up B+Down X+Left Y+Right Select Up Down will execute commands as Up Down Select Y+Left X+Right B+Up A+Down.

fragments.text: You can use both Invert and Opposite at the same time. Example: Opposite Invert A+Up B+Down X+Left Y+Right Select Up Down will execute commands as Up Down Select Y+Left X+Right B+Up A+Down.

message.body: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

fragments.text: Maximum duration for an input is 65535 milliseconds. You can type Basic or Advanced to vote to change input modes. The majority of votes needs at least 75% of votes to have the input mode changed to their side, votes are removed from the pool after 5 minutes. After that, you'll have to vote again to have your vote readded to the pool.

message.body: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. Basic mode executes inputs are they are received from chat, it is limited for some tasks, while advanced can be used to do a sequence of very precise inputs. Current mode is Advanced mode.

fragments.text: Alternatively, you can spam votes to make sure your vote always stays in the pool. You can switch sides whenever you want. message.body: You can learn how to save and execute saved macros (and more!) by using the command !macrohelp.

message.body: @Groudonger @Groudonger Your input was interpreted as A;133ms*0. Single Loop Duration: 133ms Total Duration: 133ms. Type Stop or Wait to stop execution of inputs if inputs are still being executed.
